mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_board (seq, div, title, user_id, mod_id, content, img_link, reg_dt, mod_dt, views, gname) VALUES (d_board_seq.NEXTVAL, '20', #{title}, #{userId}, #{modId}, #{content}, #{imgLink}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{views}, #{gname})
mapper.update: UPDATE d_board SET title = #{title}, user_id = #{userId}, mod_id = #{modId}, content = #{content}, img_link = #{imgLink}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, views = #{views}, gname = #{gname} WHERE seq = #{seq} AND div = '20'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM d_board WHERE seq = #{seq} AND div = '20'
mapper.select: SELECT b.seq AS seq, b.div AS div, b.title AS title, b.user_id AS userId, b.mod_id AS modId, b.content AS content, b.img_link AS imgLink, b.reg_dt AS boardRegDt, b.mod_dt AS modDt, b.views AS views, b.gname AS gname, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_pw AS userPw, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.birth AS userBirth, u.grade AS userGrade, u.address AS userAddress, u.detail_address AS userDetailAddress, u.reg_dt AS userRegDt FROM d_board b LEFT JOIN d_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.seq = #{seq} AND b.div = '20'
